```{r packages, message=FALSE}
library(fgsea)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
library(grid)
library(gridExtra)
library(rasfuns)
```


```{r files}
FIG <- 17
dat.list <- here("output", "gsea_data_wrangling.Rmd",
                 "gsea_results.rds") %>%
    readRDS()
dat <- dat.list %>%
    filter(figure==FIG)
kras <- dat$kras[[1]]
comutant <- dat$comutant[[1]]
stats <- dat$stats[[1]]
signif <- dat$signif[[1]]
cancer <- dat$cancer[[1]]
de <- dat$de[[1]]
plot_titles <- paste0(kras, " / ", comutant, " co-mutant") %>%
    paste0(" vs ", kras, " mutant ", cancer)
```



```{r plot_qq}
stats2 <- map(stats, relevel_gsea_pathway)
rank.gg <- map(stats2, gg_qq, aspect.ratio=0.8)##, p_only=TRUE)
rank.gg2 <- plot_titles %>%
    str_wrap(width=40) %>%
    map2(rank.gg, add_qq_title)
```


```{r fig_s17, fig.width=45, fig.height=50, dev=c("png", "pdf")}
grobs <- map(rank.gg2, ggplotGrob)
h <- grobs[[1]]$heights
w <- grobs[[1]]$widths
for(i in seq_along(grobs)){
    h1 <- grobs[[i]]$heights
    w1 <- grobs[[i]]$widths
    if(length(h1) == length(h))
        grobs[[i]]$heights <- h
    if(length(w1) == length(w))
        grobs[[i]]$widths <- w
}
grobs[[7]] <- nullGrob()
grid.newpage()
vp <- viewport(x=unit(0.5, "npc"),
               y=unit(0.99, "npc"),
               width=unit(0.98, "npc"),
               height=unit(0.95, "npc"),
               just=c("center", "top"))
pushViewport(vp)
grid.arrange(grobs=grobs,
             widths=c(1, 0.1,  1),
             heights=c(1, 0.1, 1, 0.1, 1),
             layout_matrix=rbind(c(1, 7, 2),
                                 7,
                                 c(3, 7, 4),
                                 7,
                                 c(5, 7, 6)),
             newpage=FALSE)
upViewport()
vp.leg <- viewport(x=unit(0.7, "npc"),
                   y=unit(0.82, "npc"),
                   width=unit(0.2, "npc"),
                   height=unit(0.2, "npc"),
                   just=c("left", "top"))
pushViewport(vp.leg)
##grid.draw(leg)
upViewport()
x1 <- unit(rep(0.015, 3), "npc")
x2 <- unit(rep(0.52, 3), "npc")
y <- unit(c(0.99, 0.67, 0.34), "npc")
grid.text(LETTERS[seq(1, 6, 2)],
          x=x1, y=y,
          gp=gpar(cex=3.5))
grid.text(LETTERS[seq(2, 6, 2)],
          x=x2, y=y,
          gp=gpar(cex=3.5))
```
